name: bullpen
description: JavaScript store interface for simplifying data flow and state management, works well with Redux and Mobx
author: Derek Dunagan (https://github.com/rhombal)

scripts._build-web: rimraf ./target/web; mkdirp ./target/web; browserify --debug --transform [ babelify --presets [ env ] ] ./source/index.js --require babel-register > ./target/web/index.js
scripts.build-docs: rimraf ./target/docs; mkdirp ./target/docs ./.tmp/docco; echo '{".js":{"name":"javascript","symbol":"///"}}' > ./.tmp/docco/languages.json; cd source; docco index.js bullpen.js collection.js query.js util.js view.js --languages ../.tmp/docco/languages.json --output ../target/docs; cd ..; echo '*{text-transform:none!important}.annotation h1,.annotation h2,.annotation h3,.annotation h4,.annotation h5,.annotation h6{margin-top:8px!important}' >> ./target/docs/docco.css
